name: vega-loader
description: Network request and file loading utilities.

scripts.build: npm run test && uglifyjs build/vega-loader.js -c -m -o build/vega-loader.min.js
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && json2module package.json > build/package.js && rollup -f umd -g d3-request:d3 -n vega -o build/vega-loader.js -- index.js
